Plans & Pricing

Simple, Transparent Pricing

No hidden fees. Choose the plan that fits your business, or get a custom quote for high-volume needs.

Starter

Perfect for new Amazon sellers getting started with FBA.

€1.50per unit
  • FNSKU labeling
  • Poly-bagging
  • Quality inspection
  • Carton packing
  • Shipment plan creation
  • Email support
  • 3-day turnaround
Get Started
Most Popular

Growth

For growing sellers who need faster turnaround and more services.

€1.20per unit
  • Everything in Starter
  • Bundling & multi-packs
  • Shrink-wrapping
  • Priority processing
  • 24-48hr turnaround
  • Dedicated support
  • Monthly reporting
Choose Growth

For high-volume sellers who need maximum speed and custom solutions.

Customvolume pricing
  • Everything in Growth

€5.00

Storage

Per pallet per month

€15.00

Storage Policy

Free storage for the first 30 days on all prepped inventory. After 30 days, standard storage rates apply. Long-term storage (90+ days) available at discounted rates — contact us for a custom quote.
